items.title: Retailers with the most China, Vietnam sourcing and how to trade the stocks
items.description: Some retail stocks have significant sourcing exposure to certain countries affected by Trump's tariffs, according to Bank of America.

items.title: Tariff tumult is likely to persist, and this options trade can hedge against further downside
Potential safe haven stock picks as tariff turmoil continues
items.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

items.title: Stay away from Ford Motor shares as tariff uncertainty increases, Bernstein says
items.description: The firm lowered its rating on the legacy carmaker to underperform from market perform.

items.title: It's time to buy the dip on this nuclear energy stock, Citi says
items.description: The bank upgraded the stock to buy from neutral.
